item.description:
Come join us at our Monthly Meet Up and make new friends or just catch up with old ones!


Hi Everybody!

This months meeting will be back in Waltham. Come join us for an evening out. Please keep in mind when RSVPing that reservations will be made. Please try to be on-time as they do not seat us until everyone has arrived. If your plans change please update your RSVP as soon as you know. I will send my cell # to "YES" RSVP's so that you can let me know of any last minute cancellations or if you have difficulty finding us. Please do not call me for directions as I do not know the local roads. For directions please call the restaurant
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby by the hostess desk.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group
